text: [Music]
from the hard work of
rehearsals to all the action on the
set get ready to take the stage with
Disney Channel's rock hit this is the
road to Camp Rock 2 the Final Jam as the
cast gets ready to shoot a new summer at
Camp the story continues with Mitchie
and Shane what's going on with you and
Shane nothing's going on oh total lie
you are all upset Camp Rock 2 follows
Mitchie back to summer camp for a second
summer of fun Shane has uh been
traveling and touring all year what he's
really interested in doing is getting to
cam and just having some real one-on-one
time I have it all planned when Mitch
walks in I'll just be sitting there and
I'll be like hey Mitchie they're totally
happy with who they are and they found
each other and now they just in love
surprise surprise her falling for Shane
and Shane falling for her and will they
ever get to be together so what do I
have to do to pull you away from that
clipboard you can tell that we're older
and that we've kind of grown as
musicians and even like friendship wise
you can tell the energy we're more
comfortable singing together it's nice
me and Demi are really close and even
off an on set we've been close
throughout the the years now I've known
her for a few years and she's one of my
seriously best friends in the
world the dght between me and Joe is one
of my favorites because um it reminds me
so much of the last movie Joe and Demi's
song that they sing that kind of draws
them together again this time you just
hear them going back and forth and they
may be in two different places but that
music draws them together Demi's voice
and Joe's voice on it just make it even
better and I think people will love it
it's a great song and it does a really
good job of kind of Both Worlds
colliding which is always fun for Joe
and J because their voices compliment
each other so well I love listening to
it and just like listening to our two
voices kind of come together and how
different it sounds it's a really
important part for Shane in the movie
and and dem's character
and I think it's going to be a really
beautiful moment for the movie keep
watching for more behind the scenes
secrets and surprises on the road to
Camp Rock 2 the Final Jam Camp Rock 2
the Final Jam premieres Friday September
3rd at 87 Central on Disney Channel
